info.name: Tanzu Mission Control
info.description:
This collection is a number of tasks for operating VMware Tanzu Mission Control. The fleet management platform for Kubernetes offered by VMware. 

The commands in this collection use the v1alpha1 APIs, which are currently the latest release. And should be used appropriately. 

Official API Documentation here:

https://code.vmware.com/apis/1079/tanzu-mission-control

exec: tests["Auth token is not null"] = data.refresh_token !== "";
tests["Org Id is not null"] = data.orgId !== "";

request.description: Provide a name for the audit in the body

Provide Cluster name as variable on collection or in body

After running this API, you need to get the TMC Agent Installer Link so you can run this on your Kubernetes cluster.

item.name: Get Specified Cluster details and set as variables

exec: tests["Auth token is not null"] = data.refresh_token !== "";

request.description:
Set cluster name to be moved in body

May have to alter resource version to match the destination cluster group name set under spec.
